body.head: 2023: nothing new

figure.head: European end of my time line

body.p: What's left to say about the year 2024? Almost everything this year seems to have been a replay of something that happened last year, with some minor variation in the detail. The year fits around me like a worn-out dressing gown, corners and creases familiar as old friends and acquaintance (a crew which continues to diminish alas).
